unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions.grouping

Class GroupActionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions.grouping.GroupActionManager

  • public class GroupActionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    GroupActionManager.java --- The manager that handles all ongoing groups of actions. New members can be added and are then either put into a new group as a leader or added to an existing one.
    Author:
    P H - 03.08.2017

    • Constructor Detail

      • GroupActionManager

        public GroupActionManager()

    • Method Detail

      • isLeader

        public boolean isLeader(javaGOAP.IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Function for testing if the provided Unit is a leader in it's current group.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the Unit that is going to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the Unit is the leader of it's current group or false if it is either not mapped to one or is no leader.

      • isGrouped

        public boolean isGrouped(javaGOAP.IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Function for testing if a Unit is already mapped to a group.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the Unit that is going ot be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the Unit is part of a group, false if it is not.

      • performGroupLeaderAction

        public boolean performGroupLeaderAction(javaGOAP.IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Function for performing the grouped action of the leader. The other members of the group mimic the action provided by the leader. This is only executed if the given Unit is the leader of it's group.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the Unit (Must be leader) whose action is executed in a grouped way.
        Returns:
        true if the action was successfully executed in a group and false if the provided Unit was either no leader or mirroring the leader's action failed.

      • addToGroupAction

        public boolean addToGroupAction(java.lang.Class<? extends GroupableAction> type,
                                javaGOAP.IGoapUnit goapUnit,
                                GroupableAction action)
        Function for adding a new Unit to a group. This may either be a new one with the provided Unit as leader, if no valid other group in the Unit's vicinity is found, or an existing one to which the Unit will be added as a new member.
        Parameters:
        type - the type / Class of action to whose group the Unit is going to be added to.
        goapUnit - the Unit that is going to be added towards a group.
        action - the reference to the action of the Unit itself. This is needed since the Unit might become the leader of the group and therefore must provide a instance of an action for mirroring.
        Returns:
        true if the Unit was added towards a group, otherwise false.

      • extractViableGroups

        private java.util.HashSet<GroupAction> extractViableGroups(java.lang.Class<?> type,
                                                           javaGOAP.IGoapUnit goapUnit,
                                                           int maxLeaderTileDistance)
        Function for extracting groups that the Unit is able to join. The groups that are going to be looked at are the ones stored in this instance. From these a certain subset is chosen (Distance, space etc.).
        Parameters:
        type - the type / Class of action that the Unit is going to join.
        goapUnit - the Unit that is going to join a group.
        maxLeaderTileDistance - the maximum distance in TilePositions that a leader is allowed to be away from the Unit.
        Returns:
        a HashSet of all groups that the Unit is able to join.

      • isLeaderInTileRange

        private boolean isLeaderInTileRange(javaGOAP.IGoapUnit goapUnit,
                                    GroupAction groupAction,
                                    int maxLeaderTileDistance)
        Function for checking if a group's leader is in an acceptable, predefined tile range around a provided Unit.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the Unit that is going to be checked.
        groupAction - the group whose leader must be in a certain tile range around the provided Unit.
        maxLeaderTileDistance - the maximum distance in TilePositions that a leader is allowed to be away from the Unit.
        Returns:
        true if the group's leader is in an acceptable tile range, false if it is not.

      • extractBestGroup

        private GroupAction extractBestGroup(java.util.HashSet<GroupAction> potentialGroups,
                                     javaGOAP.IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Function for extracting the best group from a HashSet of potential groups. The "best" one is determined by the leader's range towards a provided Unit.
        Parameters:
        potentialGroups - the HashSet of groups whose leader distances are going to be measured.
        goapUnit - the Unit to which the group leader distances are going to be measured to.
        Returns:
        the GroupAction that contains the leader with the smallest distance towards the provided Unit.

      • removeFromGroupAction

        public boolean removeFromGroupAction(javaGOAP.IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Function for removing a Unit from it's current group. This also removes the reference to the GroupAction itself if the Unit that is going to be removed was the last one remaining inside it.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the Unit that is going to be removed from it's current group.
        Returns:
        true if the Unit was successfully removed, false if either the Unit was in no group or the removing failed.

      • getGroupSize

        public int getGroupSize(javaGOAP.IGoapUnit goapUnit)
        Function retrieving the size of the group the provided Unit is currently part of.
        Parameters:
        goapUnit - the Unit whose group size is being retrieved.
        Returns:
        the number of Units the group of the provided Unit consists of or 0 if the Unit is not part of any group.
